tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
Dr AR was referred to our family by a friend.  

Dr. is truly exceptional, from the moment we entered the doors to the clinic, we felt welcomed, cared for, and completely at ease.   Dr. is very understanding, listens patiently to the health concerns, reviews all the reports.  He is very accommodative  (as I was traveling) and gave a Monday morning appointment at the hospital for angiogram.   He also immediately coordinated with the hospital staff and made sure the checkin process at the hospital would go smooth.

Dr AR explained the procedure,  the diagnosis and treatment very clearly every step of the way.   He performed angioplasty based on the findings right away, and my father recovered quickly in a couple of days.

When we visited the clinic post op, the staff at the clinic was courteous and wait time was very short.    Dr AR is highly professional and has shown true commitment to solve my father's health issues.  We highly recommend Dr AR  for any cardiac related diagnosis and treatment.

This was my second visit to the doctor 1st being for my mother.. Based on that experience I've been here for me for chest pain .. He was very practical and caring.. Heard my lifestyle completely and then my issues and my regular medications and suggested that this must be not related to the cardiac might be of muscular traction, to confirm further he suggested echo and ECG which proved same prescribed some medicines for 1 week and review.. as above and
Exceptionally good doctor, friendly and cost efficient, do visit ar heart clinic  for Ur HEART issues

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Very friendly and informal while interacting with the patient, asks the patient, not the accompanying person, to talk and observes the patient for any visible symptoms, a rarity among doctors. Highly recommended.
Doctor was very kind and explained us well.  Waiting time was less. Hospitality was good.  Will refer doctor

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Best place for heart related problems, bp
Satisfied solution given for problem. Value for payment also.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: The Doctor is a dedicated, friendly person. The cost incurred was very very moderate.....Loved the Doctor's approach....I keep recommending him to people who need

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr had provided the treatment to my mom in a complicated situation. Post surgery I'm following with this doctor for the regular check up. His service is so satisfied. I would highly recommend this doctor for any heart patients I see in the world. Thank you so much
Pretty good. No complaints. Doctor was cordial and helpful. Although pricing was a little high.  Recommended.
Very well experienced doctor. Listen to patients queries and shows empathy on patients. strongly recommended.
